jobs.title: AI Ethics Research Scientist
jobs.description: Research AI safety and alignment with focus on constitutional AI and responsible AI development. Work on developing frameworks for ethical AI systems and ensuring AI technology benefits humanity.

jobs.title: Technology Policy Manager
jobs.description: Lead policy initiatives around AI governance and responsible deployment of AI technologies. Engage with policymakers and stakeholders on AI regulation and digital rights.

jobs.title: AI Governance Research Fellow
jobs.description: Research AI governance mechanisms and policy frameworks to ensure beneficial AI development. Focus on international cooperation and regulatory approaches to AI safety.

jobs.title: Technology Ethics Program Manager
jobs.description: Manage programs focused on AI safety research and outreach. Coordinate with researchers, policymakers, and industry leaders on AI risk mitigation strategies.

jobs.title: Digital Rights Advocate
jobs.description: Advocate for digital rights and privacy protections in the age of AI. Work on policy analysis, legal research, and public education on AI and digital rights issues.

jobs.title: Assistant Professor of AI Ethics
jobs.description: Tenure-track position in artificial intelligence with emphasis on ethical AI development, algorithmic fairness, and social implications of AI systems. Research areas include AI safety, responsible AI design, and interdisciplinary approaches to AI governance.

jobs.title: Professor of Technology Law
jobs.description: Senior faculty position focusing on intersection of technology and law, AI regulation, algorithmic accountability, and digital rights. Candidates should have expertise in technology policy and legal frameworks for emerging technologies.

jobs.title: Postdoctoral Researcher - AI and Society
jobs.description: Postdoctoral research position studying societal impacts of AI systems. Research focus on algorithmic bias, AI transparency, and human-AI interaction. Collaboration with interdisciplinary team on AI ethics and policy.

jobs.title: AI Policy Specialist
jobs.company: National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST)
jobs.description: Develop AI risk management frameworks and standards for federal agencies. Work on AI governance policies, risk assessment methodologies, and stakeholder engagement on AI regulation.

jobs.title: Technology Ethics Advisor
jobs.company: Office of Science and Technology Policy (OSTP)
jobs.description: Advise on ethical implications of emerging technologies including AI, provide policy recommendations on responsible innovation, and coordinate with federal agencies on technology ethics initiatives.

jobs.title: Digital Rights Legal Counsel
jobs.description: Legal counsel specializing in digital rights, AI regulation, and consumer protection in digital markets. Work on enforcement actions, policy development, and legal analysis of emerging technologies.

jobs.title: AI Governance Specialist
jobs.description: Develop international standards and guidelines for AI governance. Work with member countries on AI policy coordination and best practices for responsible AI development.

jobs.title: Digital Rights Program Officer
jobs.description: Support UN initiatives on digital rights and AI ethics. Develop frameworks for human rights in digital spaces and coordinate international cooperation on AI governance.

jobs.title: AI Safety Engineer
jobs.description: Work on technical AI safety research including alignment, interpretability, and robustness. Collaborate with researchers to ensure AI systems are safe and beneficial.
